extendedInfo.description: Defender II, the ultimate tower defense is coming with many new features!Waves of monsters are attacking your castle. They move fast, strike hard, and never give up. However, Defender is more powerful than ever before! What's more, Lava moat, Magic Towers will fight together with Defender!How to play?# Touch screen to shoot arrows.# Drag and drop spell icon to cast a spell.# Lava Moat: Burns enemies when they drop into lava moat.# Magic Tower: Provide MANA for spells. Also attacks enemie magically.# City Wall: Upgrade city wall to increase health point.# Mana: Mana is required to cast a spell.# Strength: Increase the damange of a arrow.# Agility: Increase shooting frequency.# Weapon: Select and equip proper bow to defend.# Power shot: Repel monsters.# Fatal Blow: Double damange with certain possibility.Game mode# Local mode: Defeat waves of monsters.# Battle mode: Compete with opponent - The one stays LONGER is the WINNER!Watch out, intruders will be stronger and stronger. New BOSSES will come out as stage goes. Be the hero, and win the HONORS!Any suggestion/feedback is welcome!==========================Droidhen is the name behind Defender, Defender II, Dinosaur War, Miracle City, Basketball Shot, DH Texas Poker, Gun of Glory and many other top popular games. Droidhen is also marked as top developer by google.==========================

reviews.title: Nice game
reviews.comment: I somuch love dx game please try download it am sure u will like it. I give it 4 star course is easy 2 play and also hard nice app
reviews.author: Ethel Chioma

reviews.title: Lovely app
reviews.comment: This is best game till now what ever I have played. Good power ups, no need to spend more money, eats less battery.overall a excellent game. Keep it up dude.
reviews.author: ajit pratap

reviews.comment: Fun game after level 300 can\'t play against anyone it just logs off and local play freezes in the middle of game then shuts down have already uninstalled then reinstalled when this happened after level 150 what can I do to stop this help\tAfter you get over stage 125 or so game freezes and auto restarts in the middle of game...other than that I love this game..plays in my mind all the time
reviews.author: Mari Kate Jones

reviews.comment: This game is good don\'t get me wrong. But it always force closes on me as I am about to beat lvl 49. Everytime no matter what on a few devices and also uninstalled and reinstalled, played the entire game over and the same thing.
reviews.author: Jarod Cole

reviews.title: Haters
reviews.comment: This game does not crash for me and I\'ve noticed may times the reason apps crash is because of the phone not the app... if you can\'t beat a local level switch to online mode until you can get the upgrades to beat the local stage
reviews.author: Keith Kurtz

reviews.title: Want my Purchases back.. :/
reviews.comment: Love the game, got a new device and would like my purchases back Gave you a bit of money would like to still have what I have purchased. Still 4 stars would be 5 if the  was a way to get my purchases though.
reviews.author: j2themen07

reviews.title: Imposible
reviews.comment: Afte upgrade crushed. I reinstalled and lost all my points, rank and everything. After hours of playing and some money spent now all is gone. Sent email to support 2 weeks ago still no answer.

reviews.comment: Stage 1551 battle win 2214 no cheat in 2 months I\'m level 173 ... :)

reviews.title: Very poor
reviews.comment: Every time I try to cast my fire spell the game freezes and I have to force close...please fix!!
reviews.author: Derek Delger

reviews.title: WAS the best game
reviews.comment: 1. The game crashes after updating 2. Online mode is fake,it requires connection only to start and then you play with a bot that is 2x better. Just start the match and when ingame, pull out the ADSL cable from the router..the guy in corner will still shoot and you won\'t get disconnected. That\'s why you can\'t see any lags here, even playing with people from China. That\'s a dick move droidhen....
reviews.author: Dotman Silent

reviews.title: good game, but...
reviews.comment: I have a progress of this game  in my father`s Samsung in there my progress is already far. It`s already stage 500 , I have Final Fantasy arrow there my lava moat and magic tower`s level is 2 and my achiefment is already 66%. I downloaded this game in a Samsung, and because I already have an Android I downloaded it there too. In the Samsung the screen is smaler and the account is the same in Android, but the save data from the Samung didnt trasfer to Android. please help me

reviews.comment: I really love to play defender 2 but after I accomplished 39stages the application got me back to menu list =[ ...  it makes make me feel excited every stages and upgrading system..

reviews.title: Impossible at higher level
reviews.comment: I am at 970, it is impossible when waves are combined with no space, not playing anymore, not getting enough points when tting top clear or challenging
reviews.author: Richard Chung

reviews.title: The game is awsome
reviews.comment: The game is 100% awsome than any other and it really made me get out of playing call of duty black ops 2
reviews.author: Stevens James Gallero

reviews.title: Time Burner
reviews.comment: Great time burner with fun battle mode playing peeps from around the globe. Can be played without buying coins.
reviews.author: Dan Kriesant

reviews.title: Do NOT Download
reviews.comment: As quite a few people have said, the online play is entirely faked. More importantly, your game data is not saved anywhere except on your phone. If for whatever reason you have to reset your phone/uninstall the app, you will lose all game data. This wouldn\'t be hard to fix, a simple lock to your phones MEID number, but apparently Droidhen doesn\'t care enough, even about people who have purchased coins/gems ingame. Scam. Do not install.
reviews.author: Patrick Cunningham

reviews.title: Needs more upgrades
reviews.comment: Level 620 but it needs a higher strength and agility level. also mana and city wall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It\'s an awesome game, if you add more features to make more coins and crystals it will get really interesing..

reviews.title: Just another masterpiece by Droidhen.
reviews.comment: Brilliant Game. It is very very very additicting so be sure that You have enough time to play.
